alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Caroline; Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Hanover; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 10:10AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Louisa, northeastern Cumberland, Goochland, southwestern Caroline, northwestern Hanover, northwestern Amelia, Powhatan and Fluvanna Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 1010 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Canton to Morven. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fork Union around 1015 AM EDT. Palmyra, Columbia, Macon and Trenholm around 1020 AM EDT. Powhatan and Troy around 1025 AM EDT. Ferncliff and Kents Store around 1030 AM EDT. Goochland around 1035 AM EDT. Louisa, Oilville and Gum Spring around 1040 AM EDT. Mineral around 1045 AM EDT. Montpelier around 1050 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Chilesburg, Orchid, Maidens, Three Square, Central Plains, Bremo Bluff, Whiteville, Fine Creek Mills, Michaux and West View. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for central and north central Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Amelia; Caroline; Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Hanover; Western Louisa
